syntax_editor_macro.comments: This template creates the code necessary to access the RecordGetValue() function contained in the RecordGetValue script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: RecordGetValue
syntax_editor_macro.text: var RecordGetValue = x_snc_devtools.RecordGetValue; RecordGetValue('sys_properties','99ca5ab55b1022001f80efe5f0f91a05','value'); // is the property 'sn_atf.runner.enabled' set to true?
